posts.post_content:
I miss the old flavortext...anyways, incredible card, not only a pinger but it's a flying dragon, draws you cards for a tap, AND deals at least 1 damage per turn, not to mention comborific potential...my friend has an Izzet deck, it is incredibly powerful, and this guy is a centerpiece, along with [Tibor and Lumia](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tibor and Lumia) and [Spellbound Dragon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spellbound Dragon) to name a few...one of my favorite cards EVAH!!!  
  
42/5

posts.post_content:
Wondering which of Alpha's boon cycle is the best? Well, you're an idiot, of course it's [Ancestral Recall](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ancestral Recall). But now, you can have that *and* [Lightning Bolt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Bolt) for the price of one!  
  
Well, not really, you can't distribute the bolt among three weenies, so it's actually better this way. But still! You could win games with this!  
  
Well, honestly, if you're packing Ancestral Recall you're going to win *without* Niv-Mizzet. Come to think of it, you're squandering the potential of Ancestral Recall.   
  
You're a jerk and I hate you.
posts.html:

You're a jerk and I hate you.

posts.post_content: @Ozmahunter: Mask of Memory isn't infinite because it specifies combat damage. To go infinite, you need [Curiosity](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Curiosity), [Ophidian Eye](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ophidian Eye), [Helm of the Ghastlord](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Helm of the Ghastlord), [Keen Sense](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Keen Sense), or [Snake Umbra](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Snake Umbra). Any of those work, at least until you run out of cards to draw :)
posts.html:
@Ozmahunter: Mask of Memory isn't infinite because it specifies combat damage. To go infinite, you need Curiosity, Ophidian Eye, Helm of the Ghastlord, Keen Sense, or Snake Umbra. Any of those work, at least until you run out of cards to draw :)

SPOILER ALERT FROM RETURN TO RAVNICA  
  
Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius  
  
2UURR  
  
Legendary Creature-Dragon Wizard  
  
Flying  
Whenever Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius deals  
damage to a player, you may draw a card.  
UR: Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius deals 1  
damage to target creature or player.  
5/5  
  
(Flavor)  
He has no patience for minds that do not  
inspire him or explode by trying.  
  
Excellent card, if not better than old Niv-Mizzet IMO. And he gets the extra +1/+1 :)

posts.post_content: A lot of people compare this to [Psychosis Crawler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Psychosis Crawler), but I honestly think neither is really better. Psychosis Crawler has power and toughness equal to your hand size and when you draw cards it deals that much damage to all your opponents. This targets either a creature or player, costs 1 colorless more, costs colored mana, and taps to draw a card. I'm wondering which is better...
posts.html:
